code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link as ScrollLink}from'react-scroll';import styles from'./NavbarStyle.module.css';import logo from'../../assets/img/logo.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[menuOpen,setMenuOpen]=useState(false);const[activeSection,setActiveSection]=useState("Inicio");const sections=[{name:"INICIO",id:"Inicio"},{name:"NUESTROS PRODUCTOS",id:"Productos"},{name:"QUIENES SOMOS",id:"QuienesSomos"},{name:"NUESTROS CLIENTES",id:"Nuestros Clientes"},{name:"CONTACTO",id:"Contacto"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:styles.navbar,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.navbarContainer,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"Unipack Logo",className:styles.logo}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:`${styles.navbarLinks} ${menuOpen?styles.active:""}`,children:sections.map(section=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ScrollLink,{to:section.id,smooth:true,duration:500,className:`${styles.navLink} ${activeSection===section.id?styles.activeLink:''}`,onClick:()=>{setActiveSection(section.id);setMenuOpen(false);},children:section.name},section.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:styles.menuButton,onClick:()=>setMenuOpen(!menuOpen),children:"\u2630"})]})});};export default Navbar;
